question.title: What is the typical location of a tophus?

option_a.title: Option A: Finger pad
option_a.description: A tophus is typically located on the finger pad.

option_b.title: Option B: Toe or foot
option_b.description: A tophus is typically located on the toe or foot.

option_c.title: Option C: Helix
option_c.description: A tophus is typically located on the helix.

option_d.title: Option D: Base of the toe
option_d.description: A tophus is typically located at the base of the toe.

correct_option.title: Correct Option: Option C
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option.
